com.ibm.avatar.api.tam

Interface TableMetadata

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    public interface TableMetadata
extends Serializable
    This class provides APIs to retrieve table metadata for the exported and the external tables of a given module. An instance of TableMetadata can be obtained by the API: ModuleMetadata.getTableMetadata(String).
    See Also:
    ModuleMetadata

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getComment()
      Returns the text of the AQL doc comment associated with this table.
      String getTableName()
      Returns the unqualified name of the table as declared by the create table or create external table statement.
      TupleSchema getTableSchema()
      Returns the schema of the table as declared by the create table or create external table statement.
      Boolean isAllowEmpty()
      Deprecated. 
      As of v3.0.1, use isRequired() instead
      boolean isExported()
      Returns true, if the table is marked as exported through the export table statement; false otherwise.
      boolean isExternal()
      Returns true, if the table is declared through the create external table statement, false otherwise.
      Boolean isRequired()
      Specifies whether table filename needs to be specified.

    • Method Detail

      • getTableName

        String getTableName()
        Returns the unqualified name of the table as declared by the create table or create external table statement.
        Returns:
        the unqualified name of the table as declared by the create table or create external table statement

      • getComment

        String getComment()
        Returns the text of the AQL doc comment associated with this table. The text of the original comment is processed as follows:
        • Leading comment separator (/**) and trailing comment separator (*/) are removed
        • Leading asterisk (*) characters on each line are discarded; blanks and tabs preceding the initial asterisk (*) characters are also discarded. If you omit the leading asterisk on a line, the leading white space is not removed.
        • Carriage return characters (\r) are removed.
        Returns:
        the text of the AQL doc comment with leading (begin AQL doc comment) and trailing (end AQL doc comment) separators discarded, leading consecutive whitespace followed by an asterisk on each line of the comment also discarded, carriage return characters (\r) also discarded

      • getTableSchema

        TupleSchema getTableSchema()
        Returns the schema of the table as declared by the create table or create external table statement.
        Returns:
        the schema of the table as declared by the create table or create external table statement

      • isAllowEmpty

        @Deprecated
Boolean isAllowEmpty()
        Deprecated. As of v3.0.1, use isRequired() instead
        Specifies whether empty external tables are allowed. This method will throw an exception if called for a non-external table.
        Returns:
        true, if table contents are optional
        false, if not
        null, if undefined (the required flag was set)
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if invoked on the internal table metadata instance

      • isRequired

        Boolean isRequired()
        Specifies whether table filename needs to be specified. This method will throw an exception if called for a non-external table.
        Returns:
        true, if a table filename needs to be specified
        false, if not
        null, if undefined (the deprecated allow_empty flag was set)
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if invoked on the internal table metadata instance

      • isExported

        boolean isExported()
        Returns true, if the table is marked as exported through the export table statement; false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true, if the table is marked as exported through the export table statement, false otherwise

      • isExternal

        boolean isExternal()
        Returns true, if the table is declared through the create external table statement, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true, if the table is declared through the create external table statement, false otherwise
